title: Requires any person engaged in the sale of rifles or shotguns to require the production of identification by purchaser of such weapon
summary: Provides that any person in the business of selling rifles and shotguns shall, before selling or delivering a rifle or shotgun to any other person (other than a dealer or gunsmith) require such other person to produce at least two forms of identification; failure to require such proof shall be a class A misdemeanor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the sale of rifles and shotguns
